Package xxl.core.cursors.wrappers

The package xxl.core.cursors.wrappers provides miscellaneous implementations of wrapper classes that make an object representing an arbitrary form of iteration via the cursor interface.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AutomaticCloseCursor  
EnumerationCursor<E> This class provides a wrapper for enumerations, i.e., an emumeration can be accessed via the cursor interface.
IteratorCursor<E> The iterator-cursor wraps an iterator to a cursor, i.e., the wrapped iterator can be accessed via the cursor interface.
IteratorEnumeration The iterator-enumeration wraps an iterator to an enumeration, i.e., the wrapped iterator can be accessed via the methods of the enumeration interface.
PostponeUpdatesCursor  
QueueCursor<E> A queue-cursor wraps a queue to a cursor, i.e., the wrapped queue can be accessed via the cursor interface.
 

Package xxl.core.cursors.wrappers Description

The package xxl.core.cursors.wrappers provides miscellaneous implementations of wrapper classes that make an object representing an arbitrary form of iteration via the cursor interface. Wrappers are provided for:

  • enumerations
  • iterators
  • queues
